props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.

props.name: textValue
props.description: Optional text used for typeahead purposes. By default the typeahead behavior will use the .textContent of the item. <br> Use this when the content is complex, or you have non-textual content inside.
